name: Coin Toss Interaction
description:
This is an interaction of a coin being tossed everytime the button is clicked. The idea is inspired from the old bollywood movie Sholay. The design and interaction is made entirely in Figma.


Share and spread the love!

If you have any suggestions/inputs/ideas, please feel free to reach out to me.
